about_the_game:
This is an international language school designed specifically for adults.

You are fortunate enough to have been accepted into this prestigious institution.

With high expectations, you arrive at this mysterious school, where you meet a variety of beautiful teachers, each with their unique charm.

In this exotic campus, every teacher possesses their own captivating allure and professional expertise, guiding you into an unprecedented world of languages.

From the sensually elegant Portuguese teacher to the fiery passionate Spanish instructor, from the domineering Chinese teacher to the humorous English teacher, each class is like an exhilarating romantic adventure.

Every day here presents new challenges and heart-racing moments. Interacting with the teachers is not just about knowledge transfer but also about the collision of hearts and the exchange of emotions. You will find that this school not only teaches you languages but also allows you to experience the power of love and passion.

As the courses progress, your relationships with the teachers will grow closer.

Their tender care, strict demands, and those unintentionally revealed moments of affection will set your heart ablaze in this realm of learning♂♀

Come, step into this mysterious language sanctuary, and let the feeling of blushing and heart-pounding accompany you every day. Here, you will not only learn multiple languages but also create unforgettable memories.

All of this is designed just for you, waiting for you to explore and conquer.

Are you ready to embark on this heart-throbbing journey? Let’s enter the enchanting world of the "Doki Boki International Language School" and begin a romantic adventure of your own!

feature:

Visual novel + language learning + harem

The Teachers:

"You stupid ass, How could you mess up such an easy question? Get ready to feel the whip!"

Ms. Yang is the Chinese language teacher at our school, where you’ll experience the most authentic Asian education. Her strict teaching style, reminiscent of military training, and her infamous habit of whipping students who fail to achieve a perfect score embody the true essence of authoritative Asian education.

"Oops! I overslept today and didn’t have time to put on clothes, so I just came here naked. Hope you don’t mind, haha!"

Ms. Emily is the English teacher at our school, known for her great sense of humor and playful personality. However, her exaggerated antics often leave others with a headache.

Whenever the bell rings, she’s always the first one to dash out of the classroom.

Rumors about her are plenty. Some say she once used a crematorium furnace to bake potatoes, accidentally fell in, and somehow came out completely unscathed

"Come on, my son, you can do it."

Ms. Gabriella is our Portuguese teacher, known for her gentle and nurturing demeanor.

To her, every student is like one of her own children, and she radiates the warmth of maternal love in everything she does.

She is also a proud mother—her daughter, Ms. Isabella, is our Spanish teacher.

"Welcome to our school. Having a brilliant student like you is truly our pride and joy."

...There will also be a Japanese teacher, a Spanish teacher, and a French teacher. Stay tuned!

content_descriptors.notes:
Please note that this game contains
*Images and descriptions of sexual acts
*Description of weird scenes

name: Doki Boki International Hentai Language School

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews:
“The language learning apps on the market are too serious. I can’t stick with them for a week.”
10/10 – Plumko
short_description: Let’s enter the enchanting world of the "Doki Boki International Language School" and begin a romantic adventure of your own!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Russian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
